vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἡρῳδιανοί (Rec. Ἡρω-), -ῶν, οἱ,
Herodians, partisans of Herod (cf. τὸυς τὰ Ἡρῴδου φρονοῦνιτας, FlJ, Ant., xiv, 15, 10): Mat.22:16, Mrk.3:6 12:13.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
Tetrarch Herod Antipas I living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.14.1;
son of: Herod 'the Great' (G2264);
brother of: Ethnarch Herod Archelaus (G0745), Herod Philip I (G5376H) and Herod Philip II (G5376I); married to Herodias (G2266)
§ Herodians, partisans of Ἡρῴδης, Herod Antipas, Mt. 22:16; Mk. 3:6; 12:13*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 希律黨派, 亦即 希律王的支持者. (太 22:16; 可 3:6; 可 12:13)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 希律党派, 亦即 希律王的支持者. (太 22:16; 可 3:6; 可 12:13)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: những người của Hê-rốt; môn đồ của Hê-rốt; kẻ phe Êrôđês
